channel.title: Bayesian Optimization on MLWhiz
channel.description: Recent content in Bayesian Optimization on MLWhiz

item.title: Hyperopt - A bayesian Parameter Tuning Framework
item.description: Recently I was working on a in-class competition from the “How to win a data science competition” Coursera course. You can start for free with the 7-day Free Trial. Learned a lot of new things from that about using XGBoost for time series prediction tasks. The one thing that I tried out in this competition was the Hyperopt package - A bayesian Parameter Tuning Framework. And I was literally amazed.
